title: Ask an Australian about her household [Serbo Croat version]
creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Serbo-Croatian.
